code: import React from'react';import{NavLink,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import classes from'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{feedURLs,setSelectedCategory}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleNavLinkClick=title=>{setSelectedCategory(title);navigate("/home/".concat(title));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:feedURLs.map(feed=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/home/".concat(feed.title),className:"title ".concat(classes.navLink),onClick:()=>handleNavLinkClick(feed.title),children:feed.title},feed.url))});};export default Navbar;
